text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org version 2.7
    CodeDisplay
    71830-4Hematocrit [Pure volume fraction] of Mixed venous blood
    71833-8Hematocrit [Pure volume fraction] of Blood by Automated count
    71831-2Hematocrit [Pure volume fraction] of Capillary blood
    71829-6Hematocrit [Pure volume fraction] of Venous blood
    71832-0Hematocrit [Pure volume fraction] of Arterial blood
    41655-2Hematocrit [Volume Fraction] of Mixed venous blood
    4545-0Hematocrit [Volume Fraction] of Blood by Centrifugation
    20570-8Hematocrit [Volume Fraction] of Blood
    32354-3Hematocrit [Volume Fraction] of Arterial blood
    4544-3Hematocrit [Volume Fraction] of Blood by Automated count
    31100-1Hematocrit [Volume Fraction] of Blood by Impedance
    41654-5Hematocrit [Volume Fraction] of Venous blood
    42908-4Hematocrit [Volume Fraction] of Capillary blood
  • Include these codes as defined in https://www.mdanderson.org/oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.412.2.7.5.737384.134 version 1
    CodeDisplay
    7963V HCT
    8029Hematocrit, arterial
    5860Hct

name: HCT
title: HCT
description: LOINC codes indicating the measurement of Hematocrit Adding proprietary MDA codes
